Great sales pitch, created a warm environment with a family atmosphere. I was very pleased with my purchase and would recommend any and everyone whose in the need for any type of jewelery to visit Zales in the mall and ask for Sam 😊

name: Randy Hollis
text: Mrs Sam is a amazing person she has helped me beyond. Very nice women. She is very good at helping.

name: SaTrisha Moore
text: Sam was very nice and helpful. She is very knowledgeable. I would recommend her for any jewelry needs.

name: Lawrence Darksavior
text: I visited the store for the first time and it was a great experience from start to finish both of the sales people Erin & Mike really went above & beyond to make sure I was taken care of.

name: John Doe
text:
The Good
* nice selection of rings and jewelry
* competitive prices with other jewelry dealers
The Bad
* staff is very rude (two Indian ladies)the worst
* very pushy and try to rush you to make a selection
* not honest about warranty if you don't have it in writing then you don't have it at all..
* they tried to add other services on my purchase without telling me

name: Jonathan Norman
text: Awful experience all around. They butchered and destroyed my fiancé’s ring when she sent it off to be sized, twice. The lack of taking responsibility along with the lies and excuses the staff made up were beyond baffling. I will never set foot in this place again.

name: Shane Williams
text: Sam was awesome and very professional and made me feel comfortable and didn't make me feel pressurized to buy. She took her time and helped me find the perfect ring!

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Shazi is wonderful!!!! She has made me want to continue to be a Zales customer. After dealing with the Trussville store 3 separate times and having no success in getting answers in getting a wedding band and a certification cardfor my engagement ring, she took 30 minutes out of her time to take care of us. She got with her manger about getting our cert card and then explained in detail why my engagement ring that was purchased in May was no longer being made as well as the band to accompany it. She then worked diligently to find a band that complimented my ring. If not for her we would’ve taken our bus was to Kay’s or Jared’s and been done but she took time out of her day to handle a simple customer service issue and made us her personal customers for life.

name: Bethany
text: Very poor experience. Clearly commission based, where no one wants to be inconvenienced to clean/inspect your ring to keep up the warranty as instructed; only to wait on those to make a sale. Waited a very long time for my turn and was treated incredibly rudely. Do not plan to ever purchase anything from them again.

name: Kayla Lorence
text: Horrible customer service from both Indian ladies. The older Indian lady had a straight up attitude. They treat customers different depending on if they are coming in to buy something new vs. getting something cleaned or replaced. I don’t know if it’s a commission thing or it’s just who they are. ( where they realize they won’t be getting any commission off of you, therefore service is bad). I honestly don’t know.

name: Stephanie Donnell
text: I went to exchange my ring, and the sales representative Shazi was amazing. She was very helpful! She took her time showing us rings and very patient.

name: Jalesa Mitchell
text: Sam was amazing , go check her out ! She did everything she could to get me the ring of my dreams !!!!

name: Naia “Shiro” Ōkami
text: Went to look at engagement rings with my fiance and her sister. Was not acknowledged by any staff. Tried multiple times to at least get my presence acknowledged and was treated terribly. Lost a customer that was ready to buy!

name: Fred Beeson
text: Shazi is the best ! She helped me pick out the perfect diamond. No pushy sales tactics with her. Very helpful and professional.

name: S Taylor
text: I bought a ring here, and brought it in soon after because I noticed scratches on it and needed them to clean it. When I went to go get my ring, the employee I dealt with had a poor attitude. I asked her if anything was wrong, and she didn't say anything. I won't be going back here again.

name: main man
text: Ask for Shazi or Sam both are friendly and helpful..knowledgeable about all things diamonds.

name: Jordyn Gilley
text: Do not waste your hard earned money here. My ring has broken twice in 2 months, not to mention the first time it took them 3 weeks to return it. The second time 4 weeks. And even then they won't call you to tell you it's ready. You literally have to call every day and pester them to see if it's back from repair.

name: Judy Pruett
text: If you are wanting the best Jewelry Consultant, ask for Shazi! She is extremely knowledgeable and personable  She takes her time to find out what you are looking for.

name: Brittany Lamb
text: Buyer beware!! I searched for months to find a ring that I wanted for Christmas. My husband I went to the Galleria location to get my size and we wanted to look at the one I had found. Unfortunately it was an “online only” item. The woman who got my size acted as if she was not only inconvenienced by us but as if she was better than us. So my husband ended up ordering the ring and gave it to me on Christmas Eve. When I took it out of the box and put it on I noticed one of the diamonds were missing. My husband immediately called their 1-800 customer service number and they directed us to take the ring to the nearest Zales and they would decide wether to have the ring repaired or replaced. Being Christmas Eve night the location was closed and closed the next day for Christmas. We went to the Galleria location on December 26th and when we explained the situation to an employee they went and got the manager. The manager then asked what we wanted done. I told them I wanted it fixed. Then they asked if I had the paper work for the diamond bond that came with it. I told them no that it should be fixed period considering it was a brand new ring. After about 30 minutes of talking to the manager she said she would take care of it and we wouldn’t have to use the diamond bond and we wouldn’t have to pay for anything. I even went ahead and bought the extended warranty on the metal and the sapphire. The manager said it should be ready by January 7th. When that day got here my husband called and it was not ready yet. Well my husband got a call yesterday, January 10th, that the ring was ready and that it was going to cost $110. When we got there to pick up the ring the woman that was working was the rude woman that waited on us before and the one that rang up my extended warranty. She told us it was going to be the $110. I told her we weren’t paying a dime that the manager was supposed to be taking care of it. Apparently the manager was not there and had made no notes of anything!! I got extremely frustrated and upset. Eventually, after getting verbal and irrate, another employee came over and tried to calm me down. The woman ended up giving us the ring and not charging us. None of this should have ever happened. I will never buy another thing from Zales again!!

name: Stephen Glass
text: Terrible staff they are rude. Be careful they will charge you more and not tell you that they added stuff to your receipt.

name: Juarron Jackson
text: Ms sam andMrs Shazi are very professional and friendly I had a great experience .And I will like to come back next time with my friends

name: HayRed
text: The sales lady seemed bordeline psychotic. My boyfriend and I wanted to look at engagement rings that I had seen online just to see what they looked like in person. We told the sales lady multiple times we were NOT buying a ring, yet she kept pestering. "Why are you not buying a ring today? Why can't you? You can just give me your credit card you don't have to give me any money today." Then she says to my boyfriend, "Is it because she's here with you?" And then she proceeds to look at me and say, "Can I speak with him alone please?" Needless to say I said NO and we left. Crazy!!! Don't go to this jewelry store. My boyfriend and I both left angry.

name: Da Mo
text: Do not buy from zales, at least not this store. Made the mistake of buying from there. The lady was super pushy and she literally was forcing me to buy. Don't waste your time and money.

name: HeavyChevy17
text: I will never buy anything again from zales thanks to pushy Sam.

name: E
text: Saleslady was super pushy and would not listen to neither me nor my wife. Also do not let her check your credit, never signed anything and they opened a line of credit anyway. Then I call and she was rude and did not want to listen again. Best advice is to go to DD or somewhere else, completely unprofessional.

name: Stephanie Earley
text: Sam, the saleslady, was ULTRA pushy. I know it's a commission job, but seriously, she    tried to force a sale on me. Definitely better jewelry stores in the Galleria. Try Helzberg or Kay.

name: Bridgette McBride
text: I went there in September and I was really impressed with Shazi. She was very helpful and friendly. I really couldn't decide what I wanted. Shazi gave me her card and asked me to come back. Well I must say I traveled 4 hours to get there. I came back on the 9th of December and I stopped by. Shazi had a customer but she noticed that I was waiting for her. Very good customer service. After she got through she helped me and I promised I love my rings. Again,I really couldn't decide what I wanted but she helped me all the way. Once I finished she thanked me and actually came from behind the counter and gave me a hug. I promise you can't find customer service like that all the time. Shazi u keep up the good work and I assure you that it will take u far in life. Thanks again Shazi☆☆☆☆☆

name: B Little
text: wouldn't shop here,they are not serious enough with buyers,and try to push different merchandise other than what you want.I wanted white gold,they pushed yellow gold,but a selection of white gold mens necklaces available.Figgaros,cubans,so forth and so on....

name: Kenyun Moore
text: I incourage you to go spend money some and to visit with Sales associate (Sam)

name: Aki Shin
text: Very bad experience. The customer services look very evil, when I got into the store, they looked at me unfriendly. And when I left, they talked and laughed, very rude.

name: Mrs Patrick
text: No words, do not buy from zales

name: Christina Wilson
text: My friend and I literally sat, watched and actually heard them talking bad about me after I purchased a $3,000 ring. I bought my ring last Tuesday. They hurried it's sizing for me so it would be ready. That's ONE star. They told me it would be ready at 2pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 3pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 4pm. Wasn't. Then, at 5pm, I was told she left to pick up my ring, would be back in 15 minutes and I could go ahead and head up there. 30 minutes later I'm there. My ring isn't. An hour and 15 minutes later and she's not back with my ring. An hour and a half later, she's there with my ring. Isn't nice. Isn't happy. Isn't smiling. This is the MANAGER. She hands me my rings, doesn't ask if they fit ok, doesn't ask if I like them, doesn't ask if that would complete my purchase or if I need anything. Throws it in a box, hands it to me without saying a word and walks away! They talked bad about me because I'm already under the pressure of my wedding, getting my rings on time and I'm mad because they've told me lies all day long! Of course I'm going to be upset! I was lied to several times! What sucks for them?? I was preparing to buy a bracelet and a pair of earrings but instead, I walked out. When we got home we closed our credit account with them. TWO stars because my rings are absolutely beautiful. But, I will never go there again! She was sooo nice when she was selling me the rings but after she got her commission, she no longer cared if she upset me or not. She's the manager, yet her and her two employees sat there and talked about me while all three staring at me! So, two stars. For my beautiful rings and them helping me get my rings on time. What really sucks is I already left her a great review from when she wanted my money and sold me the rings. I'd love to speak to someone higher up, but they all seem to believe their employees, even if there are cameras. BTW, when I left, I went to Kay's and bought my earrings and bracelets from them! I was treated wonderfully there and would definitely recommend them! Not Zales.

name: Isaac Redding
text: Came to the store and found the ring my fiance wanted, ordered it and when it came in it was a 7 instead of a 6. They told me they could resize it but I wanted to pop the question, so, I told them I'd bring it back after the proposal. I ask her and she said yes but noticed, the chocolate diamonds that were supposed to be there were regular white diamonds. So, we dropped it off and now it's been two months and they won't give us the ring back and won't refund the ring. Beware of this place, read the other reviews they are scam artists that are trying to find behind a corporate name.

name: Charity Walker
text: I'm so disappointed and aggravated. Sent in my engagement ring to be sized BEFORE THANKSGIVING. I called multiple times after 3 weeks because they said that's about how long it would take. I called the Monday before  Christmas and they said it was shipping still.. Since then I've called daily with no one answering my calls. Someone finally answered today and said it was still shipping but then called my fiance back and said it is here.. when i arrived at the store and tried it on its STILL too loose. Oh and the lady said its been done since 12/10. No one bothered to call us. Horrible experience and ill have to get it resized again, but I'm going to go somewhere else for that now.

name: zoey bryant
text: My boyfriend got me an engagement ring and planned a trip to propose to me. He let them know his plans and what date we were going out of town. The sales team promised and assured him it would be back in time for his planned trip. It was not

name: Madeline Hawkins-Standley
text: This is a review on Signet Jewelers, the company that owns Zales, Kay, and Jarred. This Zales location is where my husband, the man in uniform in the picture below, bought my wedding ring (#19868058) on October 2017. When first purchased from Zales, the ring had a morganite stone, which was beautiful, but I had my heart set on aquamarine. We also purchased the lifetime warranty on the ring, and later another warranty just on the aquamarine stone I picked out. To make a long story short (for character count) during our time at Zales we were lied to, given false information, struggled getting in touch with the store as well as returned calls, and were pressured to purchase an aquamarine stone at a price much higher than previously discussed. Overall, my husband and I were very displeased with the service we received at Zales. Anyway, after a painstaking process, I finally got my ring back around December-January with the new aquamarine stone. Being fed up with Zales, my husband and I decided to go to Kay to have our wedding bands made. We went the same day I got my ring back from Zales to begin the process of ordering our wedding bands through Kay. His wedding band was relatively simple and took only about a month or 2 until we were able to pick it up, however, mine had to be custom made to fit the oval of my wedding ring. I picked the french beaded design Kay had for my wedding band to be made and they put all the information into the computer system. Kay assured us the bands would be ready in time for our wedding and that they would give us a call when I was able to pick my engagement ring up and to review and approve a molding of my wedding band. About 2 months went by and we hadn't heard anything, but I needed my ring for our engagement party. I had it for about a week and was told Kay needed it back to make the wedding band. Finally at about April or May we received the call that I was able to pick up my engagement ring, but never had a molding to look at and approve. In late May, about 2 weeks before we were getting married, Kay called and said my wedding band was ready. Upon seeing my wedding band that we had waited 4-5 months for the first time, I burst out crying uncontrollably and couldn't even speak to the lady. They had made the band in the wrong design. I was told that I either had to use that band to be married with and then we could start the process all over again after our honeymoon or that I wouldn't have anything to be married with. After several discussions with corporate, we were able to get our money back in full for my wedding band. I felt so defeated... I only had my engagement ring about 2 months out of our 9 month engagement period and I had no wedding band to be married with. Luckily, we found a local, family owned store that was able to make my wedding band in 2 weeks. Lou's in fact overdid themselves and made my wedding band OVERNIGHT! I saw the molding one day and was able to pick up my wedding set the next day! They saved us. But back to my aquamarine wedding ring. On the 5th day of our cruise I lost my stone. As you can see in the pictures below, the prong completely broke off and the stone fell out. I searched the ship for 4 hours, sobbing the entire time and finally a little girl found the stone at the bottom of the pool! We took the ring back to Zales as soon as we got back to port and they soldered a new prong on in about 2 weeks or so. Not even a month later when we were in Savannah for my birthday, I was taking my wedding set off to clean it and the band completely snapped in half (picture bellow). I took my ring to a local Zales a few days later, but not until another area on the band broke, leaving my ring in 2 pieces. Since we had the complete warranty on the ring and stone and this was the second time the ring had broken I told Zales that I wanted my aquamarine stone put into a new setting. Well now I have my ring back. No new setting, just soldered in 3 separate places. Now I'm scared just to put the ring on my finger. Why are we treated like this when we've paid so much money?

name: Nemindra Mahathalagalage
text: I went to the Zales store in Mobile AL to buy piece of jewelry and I was there for 5 minutes nobody came to greet me.  One lady was having a personal discussion with another person and laughing.  She saw me but didn't even want to say hi.  Just want to let you know went the Kay jewelers and spent 3K.  Service is horrible!  Not recommending your store to anyone.

name: Tyler Etheridge
text: I would give zero if I could. I made a purchase through Zales which was shipped by UPS. The order was lost by UPS and Zales refuses to refund my money or resend the order until UPS investigates which takes 30 days. This was a Christmas gift that won't make it before the holiday!

name: E Bee
text: great people  working who love there job

name: GeKayla Williams
text: My boyfriend and I will NEVER purchase anything else from Zales. Their team is horrible and I mean horrible when it comes to communicating with each other. A necklace that was purchased for me for Christmas was brought back to the store to get repaired in April they gave us a promise date of the next week. Since then we’ve called them four different time and has received four different dates and everyone I talk to seems to have no knowledge of what’s going on and when my necklace will be repaired and sent back to the store.

name: Jamie O'Bryant
text: Paid for a nice wedding band there. The display one was broken,  so they had to order another one.  They told us to take the broken display ring,  and "exchange" it when the new one came in.  I was not willing to be responsible for a ring that was already broken that I was not planning to keep. They finally agreed that we could pay and then pick up the ring when it came in 5 days.   Over a month later,  and several calls,  they couldn't figure out where the ring was, maybe they never ordered it.   They told us on Thursday that they'd order it and they'd call us Monday.  By Wednesday we called several times,  no answer EVER at the store during business hours.  Finally got an answer,  and they hung up on me.  We drove to the store,  waited in a huge crowd while only 3 employees tried to handle at least 20 customers (days before Christmas).  The only good thing about the experience was the person we purchased from was nice and spent time with us, and the person we requested our refund from was very understanding.  When we got there,  they did have the ring,  but we just got a refund because we don't want to deal with this location ever again.  There's plenty of other jewelers in Mobile,  even if we end up spending more money. We don't want to deal with a lifetime of repairs,  cleanings, resizings, etc through this location.  They have a nice selection and good deals,  but I'd only buy for something that is a one time thing,  like a necklace,  not something that you'll need to deal with them regularly.

name: Ashley McPherson
text: Rude and unprofessional sent my ring off to get a diamond replaced took almost a month. Then they never called and let me know my ring was back.  And it had been back for almost a week .I wouldn't give a damn if all the diamonds fell out im not sending it back!!!

name: Horace Williams
text: Good customers serve

name: Ken Miller
text: Had to make four trips! Ordered a new wedding ring, and they couldn't find it, after they called and said it was here. All around terrible experience. Will never shop there again!

name: Jennypher Begley
text: I have always had EXCEPTIONAL service withe the Zales team, every state I've lived in &  every team I've had to utilize - all extremely helpful. I've been to numerous other dealers & have had VERY poor experiences; diamonds falling out, numerous returns, etc. The team at Zales has always been 100% straight forward & willing to assist, which is why, hands down, I make all my diamond purchases with them!!

name: Jessica Reid
text: Sent my ring off to be repaired, never got notified when the ring came back, called over 8 times in a day at various times and was unable to get anyone to even pick up the phone, once they answered they couldn't figure out if it was in or not, had to call corporate...turns out my ring has been there for over 2 weeks and they don't know what happened...yea right. Will not be using this location ever again...

name: Nadia Washington
text: Always helpful...everyone.

name: Laura Peacock
text: I know that it probably had something to do with the holiday season but it took about 10 minutes to get someone to help me and employees kept skipping me and helping other customers.

text: Long story short, I've been married 6 months and I have only had my ring a total of 6 weeks because the diamonds keep falling out. I was told 6 weeks at most and each time I has to wait 8 weeks or more for it to be repaired. Not to mention we didn't receive my husbands ring until a few days before we got married. Because it was special ordered and they either lost it or sold it to someone else and had to reorder it. Save your time, money and sanity and go somewhere else!

name: Erica Edwards
text:
I promise, I will never ever buy anything else from Zales!!!! I purchased a
sterling sliver ring for my mom for Christmas and thie ring has transhed. Customer service told me, ” sterling sliver tarnshes over time”. Really I got it in Dec 2015 it’s only Feb 2016… REALLY I paid too much for this fakes A** ring!!! Somebody need to stop them

name: Courtney Johnston Clay
text: Always helpful & have everything I need

name: CJBuzz buzanowski
text: Great store

name: jennifer H
text: Very poor Customer service. Would never recommend them to anyone.

name: Tim Haynes
text: Thanks to everyone at Kay’s for helping me design the perfect ring!  It was an easy process thanks to the experienced, friendly, knowledgeable employees at the store. Excellent communication throughout the entire process. They helped create a one of a kind ring that nobody will ever have. If you want a one of a kind engagement ring, go to Kay Jewelers in the Oxford Mall. I will do all my business with them and I highly recommend them over the other stores in this area. Thanks again for your professionalism, your excellent communication and your outstanding customer service.

name: Jeremy Walker
text: Super friendly employees. Very professional! Great prices! Had a fun time shopping here. I went to a few other stores before going here and this store had the best prices and the employees helped me pick out the perfect ring! I will be back!

name: Lori Christopher
text: Love to shop here!  Great deals and friendly, knowledgeable associates.

name: Trevor Stewart

name: Melonie Tillery
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Always there to help on any accession.

name: Carly W
text: Best place to buy jewelry!

name: Georgia Monroe
text: Professional employees, best selection of jewelry in this area, lowest prices. They greet you with a smile and are so friendly. If you are looking for a piece of jewelry, try them first. You will not be disappointed!

name: Tabitha Smith
text: All smiles and friendliness in this store! Jeff, Josh, and Melonie have been working there for many years. They are the kindest people. If you are looking for jewelry, this is the place to shop. Super low prices and great quality jewelry!

name: Matthew T
text: Good variety of men/women jewelry such as watches, rings, necklaces.  Most of the core brands were represented such as Citizen, Movado, Bolivia.

name: Fye ZeZe
text: Grace was really helpful and mindful of what we wanted and our choice couldn't be more perfect without her, my wife is very happy! Thank you!

name: Mattie Gray
text: Excellent customer service! Highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a diamond without the hassle....or guilt.  They had the perfect ring to suit my (not very big) budget and got it to me just in time for the big moment.

name: Beverly Ritchey
text: Had the jewelry inspected an cleaned! Well worth the time and effort when it looks so good when they're done! Awesome job!

name: Ronnie Denney
text: Nice, the Beautiful woman was very helpful in finding the rite ring for my wife. She was not a pushy lady as trying for me to buy something I didn't like.  Great place to get your jewerl.

name: brannon ogle
text: Uneducated and lousy customer service. Would highly recommend Diamond Depot.

name: Heaven Black

name: Jenniffer Whyte

name: Kelly Glass
text: I would give a 0 if I could

text:
Had great customer service , super friendly ,and awesome music . I was impressed with competitive pricing ,the verity of jewelry,and knowledge of products. With all of the choices ,I was able to make decision and wife is very pleases with gift . Thank you Kays for all the help .
Taylor.

name: Rachel Ford Cleveland
text: wonderful customer service & my diamonds are beautiful.

name: Nona Berry
text: Good selection of merchandise, great service assistance.

name: Gary Shekels
text: Good prices

name: Alexia Rose Niles
text:
The first woman that spoke to me was extremely rude. First asking me, “Did he say you could come look at rings?” What?! I told her I wanted to look myself and figure out what style I liked in person... She then proceeds to walk away and I received no assistance. A second lady comes by and was shocked I wasn’t getting assistance. The first woman piping in with, “Oh she’s just looking. She doesn’t need in anything.” Didn’t know I wasn’t allowed to look at the rings just like any other customer? I look very young, but I should not be treated like I am less than any other person coming in.

The second woman assisting me actually set up an account and allowed me to try on and see the rings. Though I found a pretty, dainty ring I liked and she says, “You don’t want that! Those are technically promise rings.” Which I responded that I liked how dainty it was and that’s more of the style I liked. I was not a fan of being told what I should and should not like. I will be finding another jeweler that has my best interest and desires in mind.

Overall not a good experience. There are many other friendly, reputable, and professional jewelers in Huntsville that I would recommend over Jared’s at Bridge Street ANY DAY. Please take your business elsewhere this holiday season and after.

name: Christy Vaughn
text:
Tasha is AMAZING!!! She is our go to girl at Jared's EVERY TIME since our first purchase in may of 2018!
Update*** picked up my custom design ring today with my rare black pearl I got in Hawaii... Absolutely amazing job

Next visit, since I can't do another review Tasha again helped me purchase MANY items, unfortunately I picked the same watch out for my husband he bought a couple years ago so the next day I went to return it, bought thru progressive leasing, and geta different one same price, Rachel the GM is also AMAZING! She spent 3 hours dealing with Progressive Leasing to get this all handled! Thank you all who work there, you all have the best Customer service I have ever seen and delt with!

Repairs and custom designs here are ABSOLUTELY beautiful and ALWAYS on time!!!!

name: Trenton McCall
text: So I knew exactly what I was looking for as I walked in and was kindly greeted by Rachel. She told me she would be with me in a moment and in a moments time she was there to assist me. I showed her the pictures of the two bracelets I was needing to purchase for Valentine’s Day. She disappointedly told me they do not have those in store I would have to order them on-line. I told her I’ve NEVER ordered anything on-line before. Rachel told me to come have a seat she would order them with me and I could just come back and pick them up when they arrive. She was kind and helpful. Doesn’t sound like much maybe to some, but I think she went out of her way to make sure I was happy. I’ll definitely be back

name: Addy Schmuck
text: Great customer service. Vickie was very helpful with us. Would highly recommend!

name: Treasure Williams

name: Angela King
text: Tasha helped us upgrade my engagement ring. She is very knowledgeable and fun to work with! Highly recommend!

name: Katreena Mullican
text: Had a great experience at Jared's of Bridge Street, Huntsville.  Mechelle was wonderful!  She helped us pick out a beautiful setting and stone from their impressive collection for our anniversary.  She took time to explain and present various options.  My ring was assembled, sized, and ready for pickup same-day.  Highly recommend stopping by!

name: Tina Wells
text: I was extremely disappointed and appalled at the treatment I received at this location. The lady met us at the door which was locked due to Covid, which is fine, I understand but when she opened the door, she basically asked what we wanted like we couldn’t enter the store without some kind of pass. That already made me uncomfortable. After telling her we were shopping for an engagement ring she led us to the counter to have a look. She then proceeded to ask us how long we have been together as if we needed to meet her approval. Next she asked where we met. I did not appreciate her being so nosey. After looking a a few rings, I didn’t see anything that had a large enough diamond for me. She sighed at me when I told her the one she showed me was not large enough. name: Joseph Mogill
text: I brought my watch in to get a new battery. The customer service was friendly, but they were unable to complete the service due to “not having a piece to close the back.” Since it was a “high end” watch, they needed to send it to a company for 2 weeks + $20. Didn’t seem right so I decline and they didn’t charge me for the new battery they gave me. I left with a bag full of watch parts. Later, I realized the gasket was damaged, I was missing parts, and with a battery that doesn’t work. This watch is a standard Tissot, and doesn’t need “special” parts to change out batteries. I will send my business elsewhere.

resp.text:
Hi Joseph.  In the 1000+ Watches we work on yearly, we do occasionally have a watch repair that requires a higher level of service than our on site Watch Repair shop feels comfortable offering. In those instances, we send the watch to our repairman in Texas, whom we have worked with for years, and they will repair and send back to us. The service is excellent and the pricing is very affordable for our customers.

Out of all the watches we have replaced a battery on this year, yours was the only one that we needed to send off for further inspection. The reason was because of a damaged gasket (so it appeared) - but certainly it was beyond our comfort level of repair locally. Rather than continue to work with it locally, we felt the need to move it to a higher tier repairman so that we could offer the best service on your watch. Your response was that you had someone in Georgia who has worked on it before and could put the back on with the gasket, no problem. You seemed as if it was no problem and we assumed that was the case.

It appears that there your repairman in Georgia saw a similar issue that we did - that there was still a problem.   Our repairmen would have had no issue providing the service that was needed to complete the task but I understand that you didn’t feel comfortable with us taking care of the problem for you further. I’m sorry you felt that way.  We certainly do everything we can to provide a level of service that makes people feel comfortable with allowing us to take care of them from start to finish. I believe, as you can see by the reviews, that we have always done our part to make things right and offer a service that ends with satisfaction.  While you may have felt uneasy about letting us finish the repair for you, I do not believe we have any type of reviews or history that would warrant that feeling from you. Instead, I believe it’s just the opposite - that we have a proven record (shown on reviews) of making sure all of our customers are fully satisfied and we work hard to maintain this level of service.

Either way, we are sorry you were unable to do business with us and see our service through to the end. But we wish you all the best.

name: Michelle Whitelaw
text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about Diamond Depot. I had a loose diamond that I wanted to incorporate into a unique engagement ring. I work in Atlanta, so I decided to visit a well known jewelry designer in Buckhead. She was very knowledgeable, but had her own idea for the ring, and didn’t seem to listen to what I wanted.  Frustrated and disappointed after our third meeting, I decided to scrap the whole project.

When explaining the bad experience to a friend, she mentioned that Terry had recently designed an engagement ring for a relative which turned out beautifully. Since I live in Oxford, I figured I didn’t have anything to lose so I dropped in one day to check it out. During our first meeting, Terry really took the time to listen to me, made notes and offered suggestions when I asked for them.

Over the course of the design process, I completely changed what I wanted, but Terry and Amanda were very patient and encouraging. When I decided that I wanted side stones, they arranged to bring in three sets for me to view with my diamond to find the perfect match.  After I received the original CAD rendering, I realized that there were a few things that I wanted to change. Each suggestion was promptly incorporated into the design and a new CAD rendering sent.

I was able to pick up my finished ring on Christmas Eve, and it was more stunning than I had ever imagined. Even though this was a custom design that involved a lot of personal service, the price for the setting was very reasonable.  I have worked with various jewelers on other projects and I can say without a doubt that Terry and Amanda’s design capabilities and professionalism are the best I’ve experienced. Thank you guys for a beautiful, one-of-a-kind ring!!!

resp.text: Michelle thank you!  I hope you're enjoying that beautiful ring!  If we can help you with anything at all, please let us know!

name: Melissa Allen
text: I will be leaving this review in part for my husband, who never takes the time to do it himself. With that being said, his not leaving a review in no way should be taken as a bad experience. In fact, he was so impressed with his experience, that he struggled with not sharing it too soon. When he gave me the ring he purchased, (which BTW is beautiful) it was as though he was almost as thrilled with being able to share with me how pleased he had been with his experience, as he was with giving me the ring. The knowledge that Amanda used in order to help him to make the right choices, was very helpful. I smile even now, thinking about how impressed he was with the way Diamon Depot operates. I will refrain from going into all the details he shared with me in reference to their Knowledge, professionalism, price, etc. Other than to say, I'm convinced he will never go anywhere else. I can assure you, based on my own experience which consisted of having the ring sized, and having my older band recoated, at Diamond Depot,  if you've never done business here, you are missing out. Again, Thank you Amanda, for all of your help, from beginning to end. You will definitely be seeing us in the future.

She had taken her wedding set and had it remounted some years ago (on her mother's wedding band), and she gave me that ring after my dad died. But it was just too big to wear daily. I took it, along with the wedding bands she & dad wore, and her "lucky" ring. (The "lucky ring" was found on a trip to PCB some 25-30yrs ago. She spotted something shiny in the water and fished it out.) They took all the gold from the rings, plus some old necklaces and earrings, in as trade, and actually gave me $ back!  The ring is gorgeous.  I can't say enough how happy I am at the way it turned out.   A year later, I am still getting compliments on the ring, daily!!!  Thanks Diamond Depot!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Lisa!  I hope you are still enjoying that beautiful ring!  If you need anything at all, let us know!

text:
On the approach of our 5 year anniversary we decided to upgrade my wedding ring.   I am a flight attendant and have honestly looked everywhere.   Funny Diamond Depot was right in my backyard.    We live about 40 minutes away in Ashville, AL and well worth the drive.  Much closer than Atlanta or Birmingham.  Amanda our diamond consultant was INCREDIBLE!!!   She has an awesome personality and was so patient with listening to our needs and wants.   Amanda’s knowledge was also helpful.  We ended up special ordering my ring and could not be happier. Just WOW! LOVE IT!  The Oweners were there as well and adds the nice family atmosphere.   I think it is important to support small local businesses, but We got to do this and get the best service and quality we were looking for.  Their prices and customer service are not beatable.  We have found a local jeweler that we will recommend to anyone! Near or far.
THANK YOU Diamond Depot!
Thank you Amanda, & Terry for all your service!
Don and Marci

name: Wargasm644
text: Went in to look for a guitar. Found a really nice one hanging on the wall. I know what they sell for at music stores and eBay. An employee named Alex asked me if I’d like to plug it in and check it out? A sure sign that the employees are confident in what they sell. After checking it out for fret wear and any obvious flaws, I wanted it. It was very nice and played fantastic! The price was reasonable too. Considering they have overhead and payroll to contend with the likes of eBay and Amazon. They landed me a VERY competitive price and I walked out with a super nice guitar! Alex and the entire staff were class acts and treated me like they really wanted my business. Something you don’t see much of anymore in this day and age. I know where I’m going when I need another guitar!  I would recommend anyone shopping pawn businesses and such to  check these guys out first! A++

name: matthew meskill
text:
Do not go to that huge pistol & pawn shop before going to Family! Wow! The staff is amazing, friendly and knowledgeable. The selection is fantastic, anything you could want! The prices are super competitive if not the lowest around. I put a lot of time and research in before I made my purchase and Family Jewelry  & Loan is the real deal!

PART 2

Wouldn't let me do another review so here's part 2. Another visit another fantastic experience! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly! David & family have so many choices and options I feel like a kid in a candy store! I feel guilty taking up so much of their time, but not once have I felt rushed or heard that dreaded deep breath of hurry up and get out like you get other places. In you are looking for jewelry,  computers, tools, games, movies, guns shop here first!

name: Ralph Cantrell
text:
This might be the best pawn shop in town. The atmosphere was several degrees better than your average pawn shop - very clean and well lit, customer friendly, and the folks running the place were very conscientious and genuinely nice. We actually felt welcomed and appreciated for just stopping by to browse. Even my wife and teenager really liked the place and they are both easily "sketched-out" by any kind of second hand store.

I was really impressed with all the good stuff for sale. All of it was very nicely displayed too. There were guns of all kinds and other hunting equipment, tools, musical instruments, high-end sunglasses, games, sports equipment, rods and reels, portable air conditioners, TVs and other electronics - you name it - and LOTS of top quality jewelry. (I'm pretty sure wifey plans to sneak back over there without me :-0 )

The prices seem fair and are clearly marked, but don't be afraid to ask for an even better deal. I was able to negotiate a great price on a particular item I had been needing for a long time but could never bring myself to purchase. Now I am glad I waited.

This place is a 5-star business for sure.

Thanks, Family Jewelry and Loan!!

resp.text: Ralph Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We work really hard on keeping a clean, organized store.  We understand that a comfortable environment is really important now a days to make everyone feel welcome, and we strive to do this on a daily basis.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Todd Zelenka (zeltod)
text:
I stopped in the store at a recommendation from a friend at church.  I was looking for a ring for my wife to celebrate our 10 years together.  I have to say that the ring I found was an EXCELLENT deal - I am not a jewelry expert and was a little uneasy about buying jewelry from a pawn shop.  I was told that the shop would stand behind the ring and wrote the details about the ring on my receipt that they would guarantee.

The next day I went to a local jewelry store to see what kind of deal I got.  Man was I surprised - I not only got a confirmation of the details of the ring were 100% correct - I was told that the ring was worth 5 times what I paid for it......I couldn't have been happier.

To know that I got a great deal on a great piece of jewelry alone would bring me back to this store.  Then add the friendly, customer centered, genuine service I received from the staff and  I will be a customer for a long time.  In fact, I came back a couple weeks later and bought a cool watch.

Make this your first or last stop and you will be glad you did.

resp.text: Thank you Todd we appreciate your business and are glad your happy with your purchase.  We pride ourselves on having the BEST jewelry prices in town.
